description: Numbers that are the sum of at most 2 nonzero 4th powers.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a004831 n = a004831_list !! (n-1)a004831_list = [x ^ 4 + y ^ 4 | x <- [0..], y <- [0..x]]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 15 2013(PARI) is(n)=#thue(thueinit(z^4+1),n) \\ _Ralf Stephan_, Oct 18 2013(PARI) list(lim)=my(v=List(),t); for(m=0,sqrtnint(lim\=1,4), for(n=0, min(sqrtnint(lim-m^4,4),m), listput(v,n^4+m^4))); Set(v) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 28 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
